from PIL import Image
img = Image.open\(''/Users/damifiance/Documents/Lumen-AI.jpg''\)

x_offset = \(1024 - img.width\) // 2
y_offset = \(1024 - img.height\) // 2
square.paste\(img, \(x_offset, y_offset\)\)
square.save\(''$TMPDIR_ICON/icon_1024.png''\)
